document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#e0c070">Love's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b8d058">stricken </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">"why" </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">all </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">love </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">can </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#44ff70">speak </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">Built </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">but </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">just </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c8bcff">syllable, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">The </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#bc7488">hugest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#b8d058">hearts </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">that </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#5868ff">break. </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
